title: If Jordan Peterson is a Prophet what will his Disciples Become?
description:
Ross Douthat wrote a piece yesterday. Easter 2018 was a big day for JBP. https://www.nytimes.com/2018/03/31/opinion/god-jordan-peterson.html 

I make some comments on how hierarchies filter as well as provide access. 

Douthat I think misses the signs of the times that Peterson is illuminating. A Peterson skeptic like Aaron Renn is hitting many of the same notes stepping away from the attractional orthodoxy of the Gospel Coalition. http://www.urbanophile.com/masculinist/
